TopicTitle: [1.8.x] DE_IVAExtension - For All the Stock Pod IVAs!

Articles.Content: all the text in the iva's has white boxes over it, it looks like someone took whiteout and covered all the text

13 minutes ago, roofnut said:

all the text in the iva's has white boxes over it, it looks like someone took whiteout and covered all the text 

Are you on Linux?  Does it look like this? https://github.com/JonnyOThan/RasterPropMonitor/issues/12
yes! it looks exactly like that and i am on linux Ubuntu
i will try the -force-glcore42 flag fix and see if it makes the sky black. i have a windows linux duel boot so i guess i can install it on windows as little as i use it.

An interesting thing:

I have used this mod for many years, and I have been using it on Mac before. I use ksp12.3- DE_IVAv.1.0.2.

But today when I reinstalled a Win11 PC, I reinstalled the game (version 12.3) and reinstalled all mods to the latest version with CKAN, but I found that DE_IVA was not working. After entering the perspective of the cabin, the original operation panel is displayed, not the AEST operation panel of DE_IVA. However, after checking the manned compartment of other mods, it is found that JSI and AEST can work normally.

Does anyone have the same problem?

一件有趣的事情：

我已经用这个mod很多年了，之前一直用的在mac用的。我是用的是ksp12.3- DE_IVAv.1.0.2.

但今天当我重新装了一个Win11 的PC后我重新装了游戏（版本12.3）并用CKAN重装了所有mod到最新版，然而却发现DE_IVA用不了了。就是进入舱内视角后显示的是原版操作面板，而不是DE_IVA的AEST操作面板。然而经过查看其他mod的载人舱发现JSI和AEST都能正常用。

请问有没有人出现同样的问题啊？

Did you install Reviva?  You need to right-click the pod and select the IVA you want.  Otherwise, post your ksp.log file.

Edited August 29, 2022 by JonnyOThan

6 hours ago, JonnyOThan said:

Did you install Reviva?  You need to right-click the pod and select the IVA you want.  Otherwise, post your ksp.log file.

Thanks, I had fix the problem by install Reviva~

9 hours ago, Aaron11 said:

Thanks, I had fix the problem by install Reviva~

Glad to hear Reviva helped fixed your problem. I wrote the mod because I was annoyed about setting up other IVA mod how I liked them and thought: "Wouldn't it be nice if you could select the IVA", and also make sure there's a central list and support for them. It uses B9PartSwitch to do most of the work.

If you like RPM IVA, it's worth checking what IVA mods are currently supported by Reviva, DE_IVA is one of them, but there's some very good alternatives (my favourites are ASET's and Warbirds), and some non-stock support. It also supports MOARdV's amazing Avionics System (MAS), which is the successor to RPM. 

I may be adding more, it's usually based on either suggestions or me actually wanting a particular IVA when I'm playing KSP.

Edited August 30, 2022 by 610yesnolovely
For some reason the Navball isn't moving, along with the ASET HUD I placed in the cockpit myself, apart from a brief second when i go from external to IVA view.

When I try to click on some buttons, (the ones that have covers on them) I can't get them to work. I can't flip up the covers, or flip switches. The only buttons that work are the display, and light buttons.

2 hours ago, DogeInSpace said:

When I try to click on some buttons, (the ones that have covers on them) I can't get them to work. I can't flip up the covers, or flip switches. The only buttons that work are the display, and light buttons.

If you have KerbalVR installed, this is expected. The changes it has to make to support VR breaks the mouse interactions.

I don't know, why, but for some reason, the majority of the IVA components do not work.
I have a few other IVA mods but Reviva lets me change them, so that can't be the issue.
This leads me to belief that this mods' additions are the ones that are broken or glitched out; probably because it's outdated. 

List:
-Any and all switches and their respective covers (abort, staging, et cetera; doesn't show the current stage, but a white box instead
-Fuel displays (show that the tanks are empty, don't move at all)
-The screens are completely broken (buttons are irresponsive and the screens are black)
-More things that I do not know the name of
 

Edited November 25, 2022 by JordanLOL
Added a list of broken components.

This mod certainly works when it’s installed correctly. Post your KSP.log file if you need help.  I’d suggest using CKAN to install this and your other mods; note you’ll have to mark 1.8 as compatible in CKAN’s settings.

Hey,
Im new to KSP modding so the last 2 days was spent mostly staring in CKAN and loading screens to double check different mods etc. I've finally found the right mods for me while they dont conflict with each other as much.

First try - I ended up with a lot of errors, hence the whole days  struggle, luckily gave me time to watch awesome Scott Manley's videos on PS4's YT app.  Now I've finally reach the point that the game is ready to play (or so I think, since only Kerbal deity knows if something will break later down the career path) but I still get two errors displayed by module manager and from the log I can figure out who is the culprit apart from the victim. Error is connected to DV-IVA parts.cfg.

Please help, after those days Im really tired and want to finally reach the stars!

Link to log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/953mxs9iz4jy6xs/KSP.log?dl=0

Found the culprit, so if anyone encounter this, check if you have installed ASET Avionics Pack. I removed it and the 2 errors are completely gone and cockpits are fully usable.

OK, got it...I'm not sure why you think this was related to avionics - it's an interaction between ProbeControlRoom, DE_IVAExtensions, and REPOSoftTech.  I'll get it fixed.

Edited March 7, 2023 by JonnyOThan

1 hour ago, JonnyOThan said:

OK, got it...I'm not sure why you think this was related to avionics - it's an interaction between ProbeControlRoom, DE_IVAExtensions, and REPOSoftTech.  I'll get it fixed.

The module manager error message at the loading screen was gone after I removed the Avionics so maybe thats what confused. This past two days have been hard on my sanity. Havent had such modding misadventures probably since Morrowind.
